segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a growing sense of dread watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really high up, stretching his whole body for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, almost ready to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out at such an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so afraid he's going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall backward, hitting his head on the counter or floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is oblivious to the danger, just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stabilize that precarious perch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is entirely too absorbed in her dish to see anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation fills me with such anxiety for the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just so close to a serious accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
